join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add test (_QUIET_(_VARS_what_SET_this is a test_)_) (_VARS_what_GET_foobar_)
send_any

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!test
send hortbot #foobar [HB] this is a test
